about: Hi there! I'm Nati, a full stack developer from Argentina

Since I discovered programming and everything that can be done with it, I decided to change my career. It is an area that allows me to develop and show my creativity and problem-solving logic. I really want to continue learning from this world.
I adapt easily and am open to learning new technologies and languages. I seek to work in a friendly environment that creates new challenges for me ðŸ˜Š
